event.title: was organized from the Town of Dickinson in 1812

data.event: The Town of Bangor was organized from the Town of Dickinson in 1812.

event.title: lost some territory upon the later foundation of the Town of Brandon in 1828

data.event: The town lost some territory upon the later foundation of the Town of Brandon in 1828.
